<h1 align="center">
Custom Timer
</h1>

## description
Custom timer build with HTML5 , CSS3  & javaScript
    
  user can 
 	1.	start the timer
	2.	stop the timer
	3.	restart the timer without reseting to 0
    4.  reset the timer
